name: Floating Transparent Statusbar for Firefox 4
description:
Made the statusbar:

1. Floating above the page
2. Transparent and almost invisible until you hover on it (but the text is clear enough)
3. 70% width, round corner, shadow, some styles not important.


Better with:

Statusbar: Mouseover for clutter (http://userstyles.org/styles/5875)
Transparent Firefox until hover (http://userstyles.org/styles/20061)
